summary: Daniel Negreanu, the man, the legend, and the subject of this documentary that promises to take you into the mind and soul of one of the greatest poker players to have ever graced the felt.
cast: Daniel Negreanu|Mike Negreanu|Oren Farkash|Regev Farkash|Jennifer Harman|Phil Ivey|Antonio Esfandiari|James Hartigan|John Duthie|Maria Ho|Vanessa Selbst|Jason Mercier|Phil Hellmuth Jr.|Doyle Brunson|Alisha Bailey|Jasmine Bannister|James Bonnar|James Brennan|Chris Cohen|James De La Mare|Jenny Drummond|Paul England|Clara Kuefstein|Alan Rodgers|Luca Vivaldi|Brent Waters
title: KidPoker
